title: Microservices Logging Standardization
description:
Standardize logging across all microservices for better observability and debugging.

**Implementation Completed:**
- Adopted structured JSON logging format
- Implemented correlation ID tracking
- Set up centralized log aggregation (ELK stack)
- Created logging library with standard fields
- Updated all 15 microservices

**Results:**
- Average debugging time reduced by 40%
- Cross-service tracing now possible
- Automated alerting on error patterns
- Log retention optimized (storage cost -30%)

**Documentation:**
- Logging standards guide published
- Training session conducted for all teams
- Runbooks updated with troubleshooting workflows

This initiative has been successfully completed and closed. Great work by Architect1!
